Chinese.name: MPS 消息转储至 COS
Chinese.description: 使用 MPS 触发器将消息转储至指定的 COS 存储桶。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要在函数里修改用户的 appid、secret_id、secret_key、bucket。

English.name: MPS_SCF_COS
English.description: The SCF will write each message to txt by each line. Then SCF will name this file by time and upload this txt to COS bucket.
English.attention: Please change the appid,secret_id,secret_key,bucket name and region before you use it.
